pkgmetadata.longdescription: Miscellaneous Statistical Functions Used in 'guide-R' // Companion package for the manual 'guide-R : Guide pour lanalyse de donnes denqutes avec R' available at https://larmarange.github.io/guide-R/. 'guideR' implements miscellaneous functions introduced in 'guide-R' to facilitate statistical analysis and manipulation of survey data.
